data.name: Hellway
data.detailed_description:
The Hyperway was constructed through the 24th century to complete the colonization of the solar system. Providing support to settlers spread out, this infrastructure became the new backbone of civilization.

773 billions humans now live through this extensive network interconnecting all planets. As the hyperway grew out of control, most people started to call it the Hellway

HELLWAY


Have you ever dreamed of travelling the universe, exploring the greatest achievement of humankind? Then take this once-in-a-lifetime opportuniy and apply today to join the Hellway Police Force!

Fly through the whole Solar System, from planets to space stations, and contribute to making the Hellway a safer place.

Decide to patrol as a lone space cop or team up in a police division, resolve emergencies, chase wanted criminal and rush to be the first to engage and stop them.

Go always further and faster on the Hellway to discover new places, new ships and new weapons...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows XP/7/8/10
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 1.6 Ghz
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
  • DirectX: Version 9.0c
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 512 MB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
